      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String appName,
                 java.lang.String appVersion,
                 java.lang.String userIdentifier)
        init environment, Must be called before using other APIs in the SDK.
        Parameters:
        context - - context
        appName - - application name
        appVersion - - application version
        userIdentifier - - an unique string associated with current user in your system. It may not be longer than 30 characters and only consist of alphanumeric characters (A-Z, a-z, 0-9) and some special characters such as dot (.), dash (-), underscore(_) and at (@)

      • startScanning

        public boolean startScanning(int expectedDeviceType,
                             MFScanCallback scanCallback)
        start scanning device
        Parameters:
        expectedDeviceType - - expected device type, refer MFDeviceType
        scanCallback - - the callback of scan result
        Returns:
